quote: At that time, I often thought that if I had had to live in the trunk of a dead tree, with nothing to do but look up at the sky flowing overhead, little by little I would have gotten used to it.
quote_letters: AT THAT TIME I OFTEN THOUGHT THAT IF I HAD HAD TO LIVE IN THE TRUNK OF A DEAD TREE WITH NOTHING TO DO BUT LOOK UP AT THE SKY FLOWING OVERHEAD LITTLE BY LITTLE I WOULD HAVE GOTTEN USED TO IT
